SEARCH
Package golden.raspberry.awards.infrastructure.adapter.driven.csv

Class CsvDataLoader

java.lang.Object
golden.raspberry.awards.infrastructure.adapter.driven.csv.CsvDataLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.boot.CommandLineRunner
@Component public class CsvDataLoader extends Object implements org.springframework.boot.CommandLineRunner
CSV Data Loader for populating database on application startup. Implements CommandLineRunner to execute CSV loading automatically when the application starts.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Luiz Generoso

  • Constructor Details

    • CsvDataLoader

      public CsvDataLoader(MovieJpaRepository jpaRepository, IdKeyManagerPort idKeyManagerPort, @Value("${csv.reset-to-original:false}") boolean resetToOriginal, @Value("${csv.file:data/movieList.csv}") String csvFile, @Value("${csv.original-file:data/primary-base/MovieList.csv}") String csvOriginalFile, @Value("${csv.separator:;}") String csvSeparator, @Value("${csv.min-columns:6}") int minColumns, @Value("${csv.winner-yes:yes}") String winnerYes)
      Constructor for dependency injection.
      Parameters:
      jpaRepository - JPA repository for saving movies with IDs from CSV
      idKeyManagerPort - Port for managing ID keys in XML
      resetToOriginal - If true, resets CSV to original file from primary-base on startup
      csvFile - CSV file path from properties
      csvOriginalFile - Original CSV file path from properties
      csvSeparator - CSV separator character from properties
      minColumns - Minimum required columns from properties (6: id;year;title;studios;producers;winner)
      winnerYes - Winner value string from properties

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(String... args)
      Executes CSV data loading on application startup.
      Specified by:
      run in interface org.springframework.boot.CommandLineRunner
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used)
